Service Details: - Gives a voice to Kelowna professional women, women business owners and women who work for others- Offers as many networking opportunities as possible to promote one another's businesses- Hosts interesting and enjoyable social events for both members and the general public
Cost: Membership ; - Regular Membership:  $75 annually- Young Adult Membership:  $25 annually
Meetings: January:  All-day workshopFebruary-May & September-November:  meetings alternate between lunch and dinner eventsJune:  Charity event
